name: FlipPix Art - Nature
description:
An old Japanese logic puzzle takes on a new look with FlipPix Art! Touch tiles to paint them or break them to form colorful components of nature paintings. The goal is to use logic to determine which tiles should be filled to reveal a hidden picture.

FlipPix Art - Nature has nine wildlife scenes containing 62 puzzles in 3 sizes for a total of 186 puzzles. Also known as nonograms or griddlers, FlipPix Art - Nature puzzles are designed specifically for tablet devices and range from easy to very challenging levels of play.

A short tutorial on the basics of the game is included.
